title: SatoPrincess
author: SatoPrincess
created_time: April 14, 2023, 05:09:26 AMLast edit: October 15, 2023, 08:49:20 PM by SatoPrincess
content: As we dey get more newbies for forum many of them way be Nigerians dey find their way come here to start post till them dey okay with the general board, but recently the spam for the board been high and na those kind things dey weak quality posters way dey active for the board. Local moderator never dey and e go dey bad say bounty hunters come carry our corner do spam fest where them go dey meet post quota and increase their activity. Thanks to Igebotz, the monthly merit reward don help increase quality for the board, but e get limit e go fit help because no be merit source e be. Nai make I channel this one to ginger quality posts from low rank accounts cos na them create topic pass for here. This na my own way I feel say I fit help the board and still make the newbies know say we too dey see their handiwork. This campaign na for member rank and below, I believe say anybody way fit achieve 100 merits na good poster, na the newbies we need to look till their leg strong CAMPAIGN REWARDS 15$ btc/monthRULES • must be member rank or below • No alts allowed•comments for threads must dey on point • only bitcoin related topics and comments go dey considered (posts about politics & society, off-topic posts nor go count)• make your topics interesting, no be newscaster or commentator way go carry articles come post here and you no go add your own reason.• start posts way dey bitcoin related or way concern blockchain, derogatory topics like yahoo is not welcome. • No negative feedback from DT. • Plagiarism or text spinning no dey allowed. • Do not bump useless threads • Report scams like this  one• No duplicate posting NOTEThis campaign no be about highest number of post but na about quality, person way make 1 quality stand better chance than person way make 50 low quality posts. I go announce the winner for month end and give am e prize. This campaign go start from 1st May 2023 and go will continue for at least 3 months till I fund am again…..

comments.body: This is not a campaign in my opinion, although maybe as you want to achieve a goal which is quality posts and more of bitcoin discussion to reduce spamming.Assuming you want to become a president, you campaign for people to know you and your agenda when you become a president. Assuming you are a company, you can campaign on this forum for members on this forum to know about your products and services. Another is Bitcoincleanup.It would have been better if you use 'bitcoin giveaway for quality posts/posting' as the topic title, or 'quality post competition', or something related to reward etc.But let us leave it to what you want to call it.It would have been better if we have more merit sources. I have exactly this plan in mind many weeks ago, to quality posts that bitcoin is included, but I am not a merit source. It would have encouraged people to post contents that are more related to bitcoin on this forum. I mean merit giveaway to quality posts.

comments.body: Satoprincess this is a very good and a welcoming idea. Although It is not a normal campaign in the main board but it looks like a bounty campaign because the idea of the campaign just as the bounty type. There are some factors that I used to analyze the idea. Normal campaign payment is weekly while bounty campaign payment is monthly though I have not visited bounty section but I know that their campaigns pays monthly. That not withstanding. The initiative is good one. I like people that are trying to make the local board clean. But even as this, those who like to spam the board will still do it and I know them very well. And also your rules, you didn't state it clearly that the posting must be in the local board because some members and newbies would think that they can post for any board. And I ask want to appeal to others that anyone who can sponsor the campaign can also join Satoprincess in this new development.
